revised_title: Discovery of Silver in Volcanic Ash from the Eruption of Cotopaxi
tldr: The author discovered silver in volcanic ash from the eruption of Cotopaxi in 1885. The ash contained about one part of silver in 83,600 parts, which is a significant amount of silver considering the vast amount of ash ejected during the eruption. This discovery adds silver to the list of elements found in volcanic materials.
